title: The COVID-19 Invader
caption: Explain in simple terms how the SARS-CoV-2 virus (and its Spike protein) infects human cells.

title: Teaching Your Body to Defend
caption: Describe how the AZD1222 vaccine delivers genetic instructions to produce the Spike protein without causing infection.

title: Ready for Action
caption: Explain how the body's immune system, once trained by the vaccine, can effectively fight off a real COVID-19 infection.
